column4: Can anyone suggest a good IDE for Visual Basic, Visual C++, Java, & .NET ??
I can only think of mono-develop
i mean, mono is some adaptation of .NET, but mono-develop can do other languages like C++
let me tell you which languages can monodevelop od
C, C#, C++, VBNet, Web (i guess html, css, js), XML
crdlb: Visual Basic is now VB .NET right?
crdlb: mono sounds like what i need.. either of you wouldnt happen to know of a good Visual C++ IDE now?
with Visual you mean like with GUI builder?
then I don't know anything other than mono develop
well, actually I don't know if mono has it
what kind of gui are you looking for?
I think you want mono then
well mono is the only one that I found that does VB.NET.. the other one "NetBeans" also does Ruby which looks interesting
